name: Spazitron Junior High School Era Games Pack
name_original: Spazitron Junior High School Era Games Pack
description:
Long story short.

This compilation of games made / developed / modded by me when i was stood on junior high school (13 y.o. me) era 2011/2012. Due overly obsessed with game dev / mod stuffs that day,  spending most of my free times experimenting something on my PC heheh.

Content :

* Catch The Jellyfish // November 2011 // is a simple game, just try to click the moving jellyfish untill you bored.

*Hungry Fish // January 2012 // The purpose of this game is just eat some fish smaller than your fish size, and grow bigger and bigger, just like an old game named F33ding Fr3nzy.  But this game has many bugs.

*Run About // February 2012 // is a semi 3D FPS game, this is a simple game, just shoot enemy with the weapon and run away from this place.

*Strike Ahead // February 2012 // just like Run About, 3D-er in some spot but it's incomplete.

*Yu-Gi-Oh! Velocity of Tron // March 2012 // a incomplete Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos mod themed robot.

*Killer No Down // April 2012 // is a flash platformer game created with Sploder. Your destiny is to kill enemies that stand in your way without down.

*Killer No Down Advanced // July 2012 // is an advanced version of Killer No Down unreleased since 2012.

*Battle Disaster // February 2012 // is a flash platformer game created by my best friend with Sploder during Junior High School on February 2012.

Please kindly support me, any support will be highly appreciated.

PS. Sorry if these things are not good enough. (I was 13 y.o. kid back then, and now i'm 23 hehe >_<)
